data.name: A Wake Inn: Rebooked Demo
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5-2500K / Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760 or AMD R9 285
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or AMD RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
